actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Gerald R. Ford National Historic Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation the former residence of Gerald R. Ford located at 649 Union Southeast, Grand Rapids, Michigan; or, if unable to acquire such residence by donation, to enter into a cooperative agreement with the city of Grand Rapids to assist in the preservation and interpretation of such site. Authorizes the Secretary, under specified conditions, to establish and administer the Gerald R. Ford National Historic Site. Authorizes the acquisition of personal property associated with such site upon its establishment as an historic site. Requires the Secretary to report to Congress after establishment recommending acquisition of any adjoining real property which may be necessary for the protection and administration of such historic site.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Gerald R. Ford National Historic Site.
